channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WY

item.title: Report E-2024060520
item.description:
Report E-2024060520

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-26T15:13:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-03
  • City: CHEYENNE
  • State: WY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that 5-gallons of WHITE HIGH-QUALITY PU SEALER and 6-gallons of PU CLEAR TOPCOAT was released impacting the trailer floor. Haz-Mat Response Inc. (HMRI) was dispatched to the site to assist with clean up. HMRI down-stacked the pallets and located 3 damaged pails. HMRI deployed absorbents, and spill pads. HMRI completed clean up procedures and generated 4 drums of disposal.
